item.title: Tim Walz floats China as 'neutral actor' with 'moral authority' to negotiate Middle East peace
item.description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz claims China could hold the 'moral authority' to negotiate Middle East peace after Israel's strikes on Iran.

item.title: SCOOP: Comer probing Newsom, Bass response to Los Angeles riots
item.description: The House Oversight Committee is investigating the protests in Los Angeles, sending letters to the top Democratic officials involved in the response.
